Articles.Content: clicked on the little rock icon in the tracking station and the ? and nothing is showing up zoomed all the way out and back in ...restarted the game twice
Time warp a bit. Give it some time. They don't generate all at once.

nm I figured it out thanks what it was is that for some reason the rocks where not showing up in my save game. Once I created a new save game they where all there. I transfered my new ship to the approriate directory and tada! I had my first rock within a couple hours.

Edited April 3, 2014 by engraverwilliam
Hmm. Close as answered or move to gameplay questions? Moved for now.

Hmm. More details would be nice. I have seen this question several times although I did not have the same problem.

I was able to get asteroid tracks in both old save games and new save games...
